name: P33
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated doorbell camera, suburban home front porch at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. A homeowner returning from work, face clearly visible, casual business attire, relaxed confident gait. The familiar resident arrives home at an unusual mid-morning time, looking rushed. Fixed camera position, wide-angle lens with slight barrel distortion, fisheye edge distortion, Clear high-quality footage typical of daytime security camera recording. Realistic human motion, 15-second duration.
